text: The Tomcat 8.5.24 service.bat file shows a parameter --JvmOptions9.  This parameter does not appear to be documented at https://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-8.5-doc/windows-service-howto.html#comments_section as of the creation of this bug.
creator: benjaminrobot@gmail.com
markt@apache.org
text:
Thanks for the report.

- trunk for 9.0.4 onwards
- 8.5.x for 8.5.27 onwards
- 8.0.x for 8.0.49 onwards
- 7.0.x for 7.0.84 onwards
